alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 7:58AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...A band of heavy lake effect snow will remain in place across Southern Erie County through mid morning. The southern and eastern edge of the band will also clip Wyoming County and far northern Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties as well. Snowfall rates of around 2 inches per hour are expected in this band. The band of heavy snow is expected to drift south and weaken late this morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, Arcade, North Collins, Chaffee, Derby, East Concord and Java. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 59 and 57A. This includes Route 219 from Orchard Park to Springville. SAFETY INFO...Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
